name: Zombie Hotel
description: Zombie Hotel is an arcade style shoot-em up game, where the player has to fight their way threw a Zombie infested hotel. There are some survival elements such as hunger and thirst to make the game more challenging.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core CPU Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Dedicated Memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: Future releases may require more hard drive space.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 3.0 Ghz Quad Core CPU or faster Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB Dedicated Memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: Future releases may require more hard drive space.
